title: Excepting the Regulation mentioned above, all other Regulations in Unified Development Control and Promotion Regulation shall be applicable for the area
clause_text: Excepting the Regulation mentioned above, all other Regulations in Unified Development Control and Promotion Regulation shall be applicable for the area.
